notes: Third generation on A3 platform. Base 2.0L I4, sporty VR6, or 1.9L TDI diesel. FWD only. Manual or automatic transmission. TDI requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Jetta article, January 2025 revision.

Second generation on A2 platform. Multiple engine options from 1.6L to 2.0L gasoline, plus 1.6L turbo diesel. FWD only. Manual or automatic transmission. Diesel requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Jetta article, January 2025 revision.

Third and fourth generation Passat (B3/B4). Base 2.0L I4, sporty VR6, or 1.9L TDI diesel. FWD only. Available as sedan or wagon. TDI requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Passat article, January 2025 revision.

Fifth generation Passat (B5) on PQ45 platform. 1.8T turbo four-cylinder, 2.8L V6, or 1.9L TDI diesel. Standard FWD or optional 4Motion AWD (V6). Available as sedan or wagon. TDI requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Passat article, January 2025 revision.

Third generation Golf on A3 platform. Base 2.0L I4 or 1.9L TDI diesel. FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Available as 2-door or 4-door. TDI requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Golf article, January 2025 revision.

Second generation Golf on A2 platform. Multiple gasoline engines from 1.8L to 2.0L, plus 1.6L turbo diesel. FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Available as 2-door or 4-door. Diesel requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Golf article, January 2025 revision.

Third generation performance hatchback. Base 2.0L I4 or powerful VR6. FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Available as 2-door or 4-door. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Golf article, January 2025 revision.

Second generation performance hatchback on A2 platform. 1.8L or 2.0L 16-valve four-cylinder. FWD. Manual transmission only. Available as 2-door or 4-door. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Golf article, January 2025 revision.

Sport coupe on A2 platform. G60 supercharged 1.8L four-cylinder (1990-1992) or 2.8L VR6 (1992-1995). FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Corrado article, January 2025 revision.

European-style van on T4 platform. 2.5L inline-five or 2.8L VR6. FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Available in passenger, cargo, and Westfalia camper configurations. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Type 2 article, January 2025 revision.

Convertible based on Golf Mk3 platform (A3). 2.0L four-cylinder. FWD. Manual or automatic transmission. Soft-top convertible. Data sourced from Wikipedia Volkswagen Golf article, January 2025 revision.
